gold: This statistic show the market forecast of the total cyber security sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 to 2017.
The estimated market size of the total cyber security sector in 2017 is 3,489 million British pounds ( GBP ).
Cyber security exists because the threats and costs are great enough to warrant these measure .
